scripts.dev: pnpm run -C apps/vue-test dev && pnpm run -C packages/cursor-with test
scripts.prod: pnpm run -C apps/vue-test prod && pnpm run -C packages/cursor-with prod
scripts.pre-publish: pnpm --filter cursor-with build && pnpm --filter cursor-with publish --dry-run --no-git-checks
scripts.publish: pnpm --filter cursor-with build && pnpm --filter cursor-with publish --access public
scripts.up-version-publish:
npm run _log && npm run _version && npm run _push && npm run _gh-release && npm run publish && echo '

Published Successfully.

'
